text:
Odacchi!! Is Shinobu modeled after Jane?
--World Economic Part-Timer

Oh! You think so?! Yeah, I kinda figured it out along the way, myself. Initially I was thinking about how the comedian and actress Naomi Watanabe has such an incredible and vibrant presence, so I based Shinobu on her. But eventually I started thinking, you know, she reminds me of someone... Then I figured out that it was none other than the legendary character Jane from my manga mentor Masaya Tokuhiro's classic series, *King of the Jungle Tar-chan*. Plus, Jane was beautiful when she was younger too, so it's really impossible to deny!
We now know that Kawamatsu isn't a real kappa, but a fish-man. What kind of fish-man is he?
He's a tiger pufferfish. But he claims that he's a kappa, so let's just say he's a kappa!
Odacchi! I want to see the human form of Brook's weapon, Soul Solid. I think it should be female, like Mihawk's swords. I think Brook would be very happy with that.
